addressLine2: 4080 Foreign Languages Building, 707 South Mathews, Urbana
collegeDepartmentDescription:
Interim Head of Department: James Yoon
Department Office, 4080 Foreign Languages Building, 707 South Mathews, Urbana, 333-3563
Subjects associated with this department include: Arabic (ARAB), Bamana (BMNA), English as an International Language (EIL), English as a Second Language (ESL), Modern Greek (GRKM), Hindi (HNDI), Lingala (LGLA), Linguistics (LING), Persian (PERS), Sanskrit (SNSK), Swahili (SWAH), Turkish (TURK), Wolof (WLOF), and Zulu (ZULU).
www.linguistics.uiuc.edu
